entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 30.
